titleStmt.title: The apostles catechisme consisting of sixe articles, plainly expounded very profitable for all, but especially for the benefite of the vnlearned and those that desire more knowledge / by Iohn Foorthe, minister of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Foorthe, John, fl. 1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.L. for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shoppe, at the entring in of Popes head Allie out of Lumbard-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe, at the entring in of Popes head Allie out of Lumbard-street
